topicmeta.navtitle: 2.2 Removal of deprecated and "reserved for future use" items
topicmeta.linktext: 2.2 Removal of deprecated and "reserved for future use" items
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: DITA 2.0 removes items (attributes, attribute values, elements, and entities) that were previously deprecated, designated as reserved for future use, or defined by mistake and retained only to maintain backwards compatibility.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: Deprecated items that are removed from DITA 2.0 can be replaced with alternate markup.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The deprecated alt attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the alt element.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The deprecated boolean element is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the state element.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The deprecated navtitle attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the navtitle element.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The deprecated nbspentity is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the #160 entity.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The deprecated navtitle attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the navtitle element.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The deprecated title attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the title element.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: Certain items were designated in the DITA 1.x specifications as reserved for future use. These items are removed in DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The collection-type attribute on the relcolspec and reltable elements is removed from DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The indextermref element is removed from DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The locktitleattribute on the topichead and topicgroup elements is removed from DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The refcols attribute on the simpletable element is removed from DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: Items that were defined by mistake and retained only to maintain backwards compatibility are removed in DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The value tree for the collection-type attribute on the linklist and linkpool elements is not available in DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The keyref attribute on the navref element is removed in DITA 2.0.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The following individuals participated in the creation of this document and are gratefully acknowledged.
topicmeta.author: OASIS DITA Technical Committee

topicmeta.shortdesc: The following table contains information about revisions to this document.

topic.title: Cover page information

section.title: Previous version
section.p: Not applicable.

p.xref: OASIS Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) TC

section.title: Chair
section.p: Kristen James Eberlein (kris@eberleinconsulting.com), Eberlein Consulting LLC

sl.sli: Kristen James Eberlein (kris@eberleinconsulting.com), Eberlein Consulting LLC

section.title: Additional artifacts
section.p: This document is part of a work product that also includes:

ul.li: ZIP file that contains the DITA source for this document. https://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/prepDITA2.0/v1.0/cn01/prepDITA2.0-v1.0-cn01-dita.zip

section.title: Related work
section.p: This document is related to:

ul.li: Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Version 1.3 Errata 02. OASIS Approved Errata.http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/dita/v1.3/errata02/os/dita-v1.3-errata02-os.html

Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Version 1.3. Part 0: Overview Plus Errata 02. OASIS Standard incorporating Approved Errata. http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/dita/v1.3/dita-v1.3-part0-overview.html.

Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Part 1: Base Edition Plus Errata 02. OASIS Standard incorporating Approved Errata. http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/dita/v1.3/dita-v1.3-part1-base.html. This edition contains topic and map; it is designed for implementers and users who need only the most fundamental pieces of the DITA framework.

Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Part 2: Technical Content Edition Plus Errata 02. OASIS Standard incorporating Approved Errata. http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/dita/v1.3/dita-v1.3-part2-tech-content.html. This edition contains the base architecture plus the technical-content specializations; it is designed for authors who use information typing and document complex applications and devices.

Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Part 3: All-Inclusive Edition Plus Errata 02. OASIS Standard incorporating Approved Errata. http://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/dita/v1.3/dita-v1.3-part3-all-inclusive.html. This edition contains the base architecture, technical content, and the learning and training specializations. It is designed for implementers who want all OASIS-approved specializations, as well as users who develop learning and training materials.

section.title: Abstract
section.p: This committee note provides information for the DITA user community about deprecated and reserved for future use markup that is removed from DITA 2.0. Implementations preparing for DITA 2.0 can use this committee note to determine markup that should be removed from DITA source files in preparation for migration to DITA 2.0.

section.title: Status
section.p: This is a Non-Standards Track work product. The patent provisions of the OASIS IPR Policy do not apply.

This document was last revised or approved by the OASIS Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) TC on the above date. The level of approval is also listed above. Check the “Latest version” location noted above for possible later revisions of this document. Any other numbered versions and other technical work produced by the Technical Committee (TC) are listed at https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/tc_home.php?wg_abbrev=dita#technical.

TC members should send comments on this document to the TC’s email list. Others should send comments to the TC’s public comment list, after subscribing to it by following the instructions at the “Send A Comment” button on the TC’s web page at https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/dita/.

section.title: Citation format
section.p: When referencing this note, the following citation format should be used:

dlentry.dd: Preparing for DITA 2.0 Version 1.0. Edited by Kristen James Eberlein and Zoë Lawson. 14 October 2020. Working Draft 01. https://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/prepDITA2.0/v1.0/cn01/prepDITA2.0-v1.0-cn01.html. Latest version: https://docs.oasis-open.org/dita/prepDITA2.0/v1.0/prepDITA2.0-v1.0.html.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3 Removed items
concept.shortdesc: DITA 2.0 removes items (attributes, attribute values, elements, and entities) that were previously deprecated, designated as reserved for future use, or defined by mistake and retained only to maintain backwards compatibility.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1 Deprecated items
concept.shortdesc: Deprecated items that are removed from DITA 2.0 can be replaced with alternate markup.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.1 alt
concept.shortdesc: The deprecated alt attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the alt element.

conbody.p: The altattribute is available on the image element; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.0. The image element typically is used in topics, although the element also can appear as a child of ph in DITA maps.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the alt attribute is used in DITA 1.x releases.

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the alt attribute can be replaced by the alt element in DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.2 boolean
concept.shortdesc: The deprecated boolean element is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the state element.

conbody.p: The boolean element has been deprecated since DITA 1.0. It typically is used in topics, although the element also can appear as a child of ph in DITA maps.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the boolean element is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: She said <boolean state="yes"/> when I asked her to marry me!

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the boolean element can be replaced by the state element in DITA 2.0.
section.codeblock: She said <state name="boolean" value="yes"/> when I asked her to marry me!

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.3 longdescref

conbody.p: The longdescrefattribute is available on the image element; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.2. The image element typically is used in topics, although the element also can appear as a child of ph in DITA maps.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the longdescref attribute is used in DITA 1.x releases.

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the longdescref attribute can be replaced by the longdescref element in DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.4 navtitle
concept.shortdesc: The deprecated navtitle attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the navtitle element.

conbody.p: The navtitleattribute is available on the topicref element and specializations of topicref; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.2.
The topicref element is available only in DITA maps.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the navtitle attribute is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: <subjectScheme> <subjectdef keys="os" navtitle="Operating system"> <subjectdef keys="linux" navtitle="Linux"> <subjectdef keys="redhat" navtitle="RedHat Linux"/> <subjectdef keys="suse" navtitle="SuSE Linux"/> </subjectdef> <subjectdef keys="windows" navtitle="Windows"/> <subjectdef keys="zos" navtitle="z/OS"/> </subjectdef> <enumerationdef> <attributedef name="platform"/> <subjectdef keyref="os"/> </enumerationdef> </subjectScheme>

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the alt attribute can be replaced by the alt element in DITA 2.0.
section.codeblock: <subjectScheme> <subjectdef keys="os"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>Operating systems</navtitle> </topicmeta> <subjectdef keys="linux"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>Linux</navtitle> </topicmeta> <subjectdef keys="redhat"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>RedHat Linux</navtitle> </topicmeta> </subjectdef> <subjectdef keys="suse"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>SUSE Linux</navtitle> </topicmeta> </subjectdef> </subjectdef> <subjectdef keys="windows"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>Windows</navtitle> </topicmeta> </subjectdef> <subjectdef keys="zos"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>z/OS</navtitle> </topicmeta> </subjectdef> </subjectdef> <enumerationdef> <attributedef name="platform"/> <subjectdef keyref="os"/> </enumerationdef> </subjectScheme>

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.5 nbsp
concept.shortdesc: The deprecated nbspentity is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the #160 entity.

conbody.p: The nbspentity was deprecated in DITA 1.2. The entity was available for use in topics and specializations of topics.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the nbspentity is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: When using Feline Greenies pill pockets, you might need to keep them secured in order to prevent your cat from absconding with the delicious morsels. A mason jar with a tight lid will work well.

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the nbspentity can be replaced by the #160 entity in DITA 2.0.
section.codeblock: When using Feline Greenies pill pockets, you might need to keep them secured in order to prevent your cat from absconding with the delicious morsels. A mason jar with a tight lid will work well.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.6 print
concept.shortdesc: The deprecated navtitle attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the navtitle element.

conbody.p: The navtitleattribute is available on the topicref element and specializations of topicref; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.3.
The topicref element is available only in DITA maps.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the print attribute is used in DITA 1.x releases.

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the print attribute can be replaced by the deliveryTarget attribute in DITA 2.0.

The above code sample assumes that a DITAVAL file is used to exclude topicref deliveryTarget="Web-only"/> when a print deliverable is published. A subject scheme map can be used to define permitted values for the deliveryTarget attribute.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.1.7 title
concept.shortdesc: The deprecated title attribute is removed from DITA 2.0. It can be replaced with the title element.

conbody.p: The titleattribute is available on the map element and specializations of map; the attribute has been deprecated since DITA 1.1.

section.title: DITA 1.3 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the title attribute is used in DITA 1.x releases.
section.codeblock: <map title="Bats> <topicref href="bats.dita"> <topicref href="batcaring.dita"/> <topicref href="batfeeding.dita"/> <topicref href="batsonar.dita"/> <topicref href="batguano.dita"/> <topicref href="bathistory.dita"/> </topicref> </map>

section.title: DITA 2.0 markup
section.p: The following code sample shows how the title attribute can be replaced by the title element in DITA 2.0.
section.codeblock: <map> <title>Bats</title> <topicref href="bats.dita"> <topicref href="batcaring.dita"/> <topicref href="batfeeding.dita"/> <topicref href="batsonar.dita"/> <topicref href="batguano.dita"/> <topicref href="bathistory.dita"/> </topicref> </map>

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.2 "Reserved for future use" items
concept.shortdesc: Certain items were designated in the DITA 1.x specifications as reserved for future use. These items are removed in DITA 2.0.

conbody.p: There is no migration path for items that were designated as reserved for future use. The OASIS DITA Technical Committee cannot offer migration advice for items that were never formally defined, as we cannot guess how implementations might have used these items.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.2.1 collection-type on relcolspec and reltable
concept.shortdesc: The collection-type attribute on the relcolspec and reltable elements is removed from DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.2.2 indextermref
concept.shortdesc: The indextermref element is removed from DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.2.3 locktitle on topichead and topicgroup
concept.shortdesc: The locktitleattribute on the topichead and topicgroup elements is removed from DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.2.4 refcols
concept.shortdesc: The refcols attribute on the simpletable element is removed from DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.3 Defined-by-mistake items
concept.shortdesc: Items that were defined by mistake and retained only to maintain backwards compatibility are removed in DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.3.1 collection-type="tree"
concept.shortdesc: The value tree for the collection-type attribute on the linklist and linkpool elements is not available in DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.3.2 keyref on navref
concept.shortdesc: The keyref attribute on the navref element is removed in DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 3.3.3 query

conbody.p: The query attribute on the link and topicref elements is removed from DITA 2.0.

concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
concept.title: 4 Migration aids
